EmailTemplate.name: TBC Take Over - Deadline
EmailTemplate.subject: Final Call - The Challenge NCS Take Over
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Graduate Take Over!
Applications will close on Thursday 5th February @ 17:00!
This is your final chance to get involved with the first ever Graduate Take Over with The Challenge.
Do you want to see what happens behind the scenes at Challenge HQ?
We are on the hunt for graduates to visit Challenge HQ to get some hands on experience. We will match you with a role coach and over the course of three afternoons you will research, design and plan a unique project as a team.
We are looking for you to come to our head office; 52 Charlotte Street, Birmingham, B3 1AR on Tuesday 17th, Wednesday 18th and Thursday19th February, between 1pm to 4pm.
Travel expenses will be reimbursed and refreshments will be provided.
If you are interested in getting involved please contact vicky.harrold@the-challenge.org
